back_cards.example_en: She planted a seed in the garden.
The idea was the seed of change.
The bird ate the sunflower seed.
His speech planted a seed of hope.
She was the top seed in the tournament.
The vast desert stretched endlessly.
He had a vast collection of books.
Her knowledge was vast and varied.
The project required vast resources.
A vast number of stars shone above.
He rode his bike to school.
Her bike roared down the highway.
The bike had a flat tire.
She rented a bike for the tour.
Kids raced their bikes in the park.
She enjoyed German culture.
He spoke fluent German.
The German festival was lively.
The German car was reliable.
They celebrated a German holiday.

back_cards.definition_en: A person or company that hires
back_cards.example_en: Her employer offered a raise.
The employer valued hard work.
His employer was a tech firm.
The employer posted new openings.
She consulted her employer about leave.
He dragged the box across the floor.
The meeting dragged on for hours.
Her dress dragged on the ground.
She dragged at the show.
The speech dragged unnecessarily.
The technical issue delayed the launch.
She had technical skills in coding.
The manual was too technical.
The car had a technical fault.
His technical explanation was clear.
The flood was a natural disaster.
The project was a complete disaster.
The disaster left the town in ruins.
The fire was a disaster for the factory.
Her plan ended in disaster.
She displayed her artwork at the gallery.
The store displayed new products.
He displayed great courage.
They displayed the trophies proudly.
She displayed her emotions clearly.
The sale of the house was quick.
The store held a big sale.
The sale was finalized today.
Sales increased during the holidays.
The car’s sale was a bargain.

back_cards.definition_en: A room with a toilet and sink
back_cards.example_en: The bathroom needed cleaning.
She renovated the bathroom.
The restaurant’s bathroom was spotless.
The bathroom had a new tub.
He locked the bathroom door.
She succeeded in passing the exam.
The team succeeded in their mission.
His business succeeded quickly.
She succeeded her mentor as leader.
He succeeded through hard work.
Her work was consistent and reliable.
The results were consistent with predictions.
He was consistent in his routine.
The quality was consistent across batches.
Her consistent effort paid off.

back_cards.definition_en: A list of tasks or topics
back_cards.example_en: The meeting’s agenda was packed.
Her agenda was to promote equality.
The company’s agenda focused on growth.
The agenda was sent to attendees.
His agenda was clear from the start.
Police handled law enforcement.
Enforcement of the policy was strict.
Enforcement ensured safety standards.
Tax enforcement was tightened.
Enforcement of the ban began.
Her diet included lots of vegetables.
He followed a low-carb diet.
The diet helped her lose weight.
The doctor prescribed a new diet.
The region’s diet was fish-based.
The silence in the room was calming.
Her silence meant she disagreed.
They observed a minute of silence.
The forest was full of silence.
His silence frustrated the team.
The journalist covered the election.
She’s a journalist for a major paper.
The journalist exposed the scandal.
He worked as a freelance journalist.
The journalist interviewed the mayor.
She read the Bible every morning.
The Bible was on the church pew.
This book is the Bible of cooking.
He treated the manual like a Bible.
The Bible inspired her faith.
The queen ruled with wisdom.
She was the queen of fashion.
He played the queen of hearts.
The queen moved across the board.
She was crowned prom queen.
She divided the cake among friends.
They divided the profits equally.
The issue divided the community.
The wall divided the room.
He divided six by two.
The trip was a big expense.
She tracked her daily expenses.
Repairs were done at great expense.
The company covered travel expenses.
He succeeded at the expense of his health.
She added cream to her coffee.
The cream soothed her skin.
He was the cream of the team.
The cake was topped with cream.
The soup had a cream base.
Exposure to cold caused frostbite.
The scandal got media exposure.
Her exposure to art inspired her.
The exposure of secrets shocked them.
The photo needed more exposure.
Safety was the top priority.
Her priority was finishing the project.
The company’s priority was growth.
Emergency vehicles have priority.
Education is a priority for parents.
The soil was rich for planting.
His shoes were covered in soil.
The soil supported healthy crops.
She returned to her native soil.
The soil was tested for nutrients.
The angel appeared in the story.
She was an angel during the crisis.
The painting depicted an angel.
Her smile was like an angel’s.
He called his daughter his little angel.
Their journey across Europe was exciting.
Her journey to recovery was long.
His journey through life taught him much.
The journey by sea was rough.
The book described a hero’s journey.
Her comment was relevant to the topic.
The data was relevant to the study.
His experience was relevant to the job.
The evidence was highly relevant.
The article provided relevant insights.
The tank held fresh water.
The tank rolled through the field.
The fish swam in the tank.
The gas tank was nearly empty.
The project was a complete tank.
She added cheese to the sandwich.
The cheese was aged for flavor.
He bought cheese from the market.
That joke was pure cheese.
The recipe used cream cheese.
The schedule was packed with meetings.
Her schedule included a gym session.
The train schedule was posted.
He followed a tight schedule.
The project’s schedule was delayed.
The bedroom had a cozy bed.
She decorated her bedroom brightly.
The bedroom was quiet at night.
He studied in his bedroom.
The house had three bedrooms.
Her tone was calm and confident.
The guitar’s tone was clear.
His tone suggested frustration.
The room’s tone was warm and inviting.
The letter had a formal tone.
Her selection of colors was bold.
The store had a wide selection.
His selection was the best candidate.
The selection of players took time.
The menu’s selection was impressive.
The plan worked perfectly.
She was perfectly happy with the result.
The cake was baked perfectly.
He timed it perfectly.
Her speech was delivered perfectly.
The car’s wheel needed repair.
He gripped the wheel tightly.
The wheel turned smoothly.
The wheel of fortune spun.
The bike’s wheel was sturdy.
The gap in the fence was fixed.
The gap between rich and poor grew.
There was a gap in the conversation.
The gap in the data was noticeable.
She crossed the gap carefully.
The veteran was honored for service.
He’s a veteran of the industry.
The veteran teacher led the class.
She’s a veteran of the company.
The veteran shared war stories.
They disagreed on the budget.
She disagreed with his decision.
Their views disagreed sharply.
He disagreed about the strategy.
The reports disagreed on the facts.
Honesty was his best characteristic.
The car’s characteristic was speed.
Her characteristic smile was infectious.
The characteristic of the fabric was softness.
Curiosity was a characteristic of the child.
She ate protein after her workout.
The protein was studied in the lab.
Fish is a good source of protein.
Protein supports muscle repair.
The shake was high in protein.
Her resolution was to exercise daily.
The council passed a resolution.
The resolution of the issue was quick.
The image had high resolution.
His New Year’s resolution was bold.
She held him in high regard.
He paid no regard to the warning.
In this regard, they agreed.
She acted with regard for safety.
His regard for tradition was strong.
Fewer people attended this year.
She had fewer books than him.
Fewer cars were on the road.
They made fewer mistakes today.
Fewer options were available.
The engineer built a sturdy bridge.
She’s a software engineer.
The engineer fixed the machine.
He worked as an aerospace engineer.
The engineer designed the skyscraper.
She served soup in a deep dish.
The dish was spicy and flavorful.
The dish held fresh fruit.
Her signature dish was pasta.
They shared the latest dish on the celebrity.
The waste was sent to recycling.
Leaving lights on is a waste of energy.
Arguing was a waste of time.
The waste piled up quickly.
The project was a waste of funds.
She printed the document for the meeting.
The book was printed last year.
The logo was printed on the shirt.
He printed photos from the trip.
She printed her name clearly.
She sought help for her depression.
The depression affected jobs.
The depression in the ground held water.
He fell into a depression after the loss.
The industry faced a depression.
The contrast between the colors was striking.
Her speech was a contrast to his.
The contrast in their styles was clear.
The photo’s contrast was adjusted.
The contrast highlighted their strengths.
It was merely a suggestion.
He’s merely a beginner at chess.
The issue was merely a misunderstanding.
She spoke merely to clarify.
It was merely a coincidence.

back_cards.definition_en: A path or way to travel
back_cards.example_en: The route to the lake was scenic.
The delivery route was optimized.
They took a new route home.
Her route to success was hard work.
The data followed a secure route.
